mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notice WHERE receiverid = #{userId} AND msgtype = #{type};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message ( msgcontent, senderid, receiverid, msgstatus, msgtype, message.time, message.articleid ) VALUES ( #{msgcontent}, #{senderid}, (select article.authorid from article where articleid = #{articleid}), #{msgstatus}, #{msgtype}, #{time}, #{articleid} )
